Articles.Content: This is what happen after a while, clicking "v" to change the camera view on Mun surface. My Kerbal is fell down as if there were no ground.

If you can reproduce this, please try to find exact steps and upload your output_log.txt and/or a quicksave. If you're not sure where to find that, please read the [thread=92230]Stock Support & Bug Reporting Guide[/thread].
